person.persName: William T. Pitts (Scott County, KY, mechanic)

body.p: Scott County, Kentucky, mechanic. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah E. Thomas Pitts in Scott County, Kentucky, on May 27, 1850. Father of Fannie Pitts and William H. Pitts. Wagon maker in Harrison County, Kentucky, in 1850. Mechanic in Scott County in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in Scott County in 1860.
